ms.label:
Multi
Safepay
   (2.3.1)

allow_convert_currency.label: Allow currency conversion to Euro
allow_convert_currency.comment: If store currency is not allowed by settings. Used for each gateways.

use_redirect.label: Auto. redirect
use_redirect.comment: Automatically redirects a customer back to the webshop after a succesful payment. (Skips MultiSafepay's 'Transaction Complete' screen)

use_onestepcheckout.label: One Step Checkout
use_onestepcheckout.comment: Are you using the One Step Checkout Module?

send_update_email.label: Send the order update e-mail to customer

keep_cart.label: Cart remains active when the customer returns to the webshop or cancels an order

paylink_create.label: Create a payment link for manually created orders?
paylink_create.comment: A payment link will be created when adding an order using the Magento backend.

gateway_reset.label: Reset Gateway
gateway_reset.comment: This option is used to allow the payment selection at MultiSafepay when createing payment links for orders created in the Magento Backend and with a preselected MultiSafepay payment method

show_gateway_images.label: Show the gateway image if it exists

fee_amount.label: Payment fee amount
fee_amount.comment: Payment fee add like 0:5 this means a fixed fee of 0 euro and 5%

fee_tax_class.label: Tax class for payment fee
fee_tax_class.comment: Select which tax class should be used for the payment fee

fee_incexc.label: Show payment fee incl. tax during checkout

fee_description.label: Payment fee description, visible in order totals

card_select.label: Selecte Creditcards to enable in checkout

fee_amount.comment: Payment fee add like 0:5 this means a fixed fee of 0 euro and 5%

fee_tax_class.comment: Select which tax class should be used for the payment fee

fee_incexc.label: Show payment fee incl. tax during checkout

fee_description.label: Payment fee description, visible in order totals

bno_no_invoice.label: Enable the invoice e-mail for this payment method?

ip_filter.label: Only visible for the following IP address
ip_filter.comment: You can add multiple addresses seperated by ;

ip_filter_test.label: Only visible for the following IP address (for Test Account)
ip_filter_test.comment: You can add multiple addresses seperated by ;

ip_filter_test_for_live_mode.label: Enable Test Account for these IP(s) when enabled Live Account

send_request_after_shipping.label: Send shipped status after complete order
send_request_after_shipping.comment: Order status will be set to shipped at MultiSafepay

disable_checkout.label: Disable normal checkout
disable_checkout.comment: When you only offer Fastcheckout you can use this option to disable the normal checkout (hides the buttons to go to the checkout)

allow_fcofeed.label: Allow FastCheckout Product Feed
allow_fcofeed.comment: With this option enabled, FastCheckout can request your productfeed if configured at FastCheckout

use_redirect.label: Auto redirect
use_redirect.comment: Automatically redirects the customer back to the webshop after payment. (Skips the 'Transaction Complete' screen)

send_new_account_email.label: Send new account email
send_new_account_email.comment: Send the new account email when a customer account is created after using Fast Checkout

auto_login_fco_user.label: Automatic login
auto_login_fco_user.comment: Login the customer after returning from Fast Checkout

redirect_to_account.label: Let the customer redirect to their account page

agreements_active.label: Force accept agreements
agreements_active.comment: If enabled the customer must accept the terms and conditions in the fast checkout process

agreements_url.label: Alternate Agreements URL
agreements_url.comment: Leave this empty for the standard URL for the agreements
